definition: to depend on/to comply with or listen to sb/according to/in the light of
back to where we were (idiom); absolutely no improvement/Things haven't changed at all.
to be one's old self (idiom)/to be unchanged/(derog.) to be stuck in one's ways

sentences.english: His voice still stood with courage.
sentences.chinese: 他的語音依然是那麼勇敢堅定。

sentences.english: Millions of residences remain without power and water.
sentences.chinese: 數百萬戶家庭依然斷水斷電。

sentences.english: Strike was over, but problem existed stilly .
sentences.chinese: 罷工雖然解決了，但問題依然存在。

sentences.english: Mercerization of cotton fabrics is still very popular.
sentences.chinese: 棉織物的絲光整理依然很受歡迎。

sentences.english: Chen Duxiu was still for moderation and concessions to the Wuhan Kuomintang.
sentences.chinese: 陳獨秀卻依然主張對武漢國民黨的妥協退讓。

sentences.english: There remained much support for small-scale district control.
sentences.chinese: 小範圍的地區控制依然享有很多支持。

sentences.english: POW is still legally bound by the Uniform Code of Military Justice and ethically guided by the Code of Conduct.
sentences.chinese: 戰俘依然受軍法約束，以及軍人守則的道德指導。

sentences.english: The city still stands though much changed.
sentences.chinese: 那個城市雖然歷經滄海桑田依然健在。

sentences.english: And a big number of cars are still sold around the world because of their look.
sentences.chinese: 而世界上很多車依然是在賣外觀。

sentences.english: BMW still trails Audi as the top luxury car brand in China.
sentences.chinese: 在中國，寶馬依然不敵奧迪頭號豪華車品牌的地位。

sentences.english: Other good security characteristic of one-time pad is pointed out at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 同時指出一次一密體制依然具有很好的安全特性。

sentences.english: I still feel giddy and excited when he does this.
sentences.chinese: 每次他這樣做的時候，我依然心花怒放。

sentences.english: I think we are still living in a male-dominated society.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲現今社會依然以男性爲主導。

sentences.english: that it's okay to not do great in studio, but you can still succeed.
sentences.chinese: 在工作室學習不太好不要緊，你依然能成功。

sentences.english: Two arms strech out naturally, even with one rope connecting two hands.
sentences.chinese: 用一根繩子綁住兩隻手，雙臂依然能夠展開。

sentences.english: Because two decades later, my scars still ache.
sentences.chinese: 因爲20多年過去了，我的傷處依然痛着。

definition: despite/although/even though/in spite of/unhesitatingly/do not hesitate (to ask, complain etc)/(go ahead and do it) without hesitating
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
straight (in a straight line)/continuously/always/from the beginning of ... up to .../all along
